select RID as CASE_RID, ACCESS_ID as access_id, ACCESS_TENANT as access_tenant,
SERVER_PLACE as server_place, SPONSER as sponsor, SPONSER_CERT_TYPE as sponsor_cert_type, SPONSER_CERT_NUM as sponsor_cert_num, SPONSER_PROVINCE as sponsor_province, SPONSER_ADDRESS as sponsor_address, SPONSER_CERT_ADDRESS as sponsor_cert_address, MANAGER as manager, MANAGER_CERT_TYPE asmanager_cert_type, MANAGER_CERT_NUM as manager_cert_num, MANAGER_TEL_NUM as manager_tel_num, MANAGER_MOBILE as manager_mobile, MANAGER_EMAIL as manager_email, SPONSER_CASE_NUM as sponsor_case_num, SPONSER_CASE_STATE as sponsor_case_state, WEBSITE_NAME as website_name, WEBSITE_URL as website_url, WEBSITE_MANAGER as website_manager, WEBSITE_MANAGER_TEL_NUM as website_manager_tel_num, WEBSITE_MANAGER_MOBILE as website_manager_mobile, WEBSITE_MANAGER_EMAIL as website_manager_email, WEBSITE_CASE_NAME as website_case_num, WEBSITE_CASE_STATE as website_case_state, DOMAIN_NAME as domain_name, WEBSITE_MANAGER_CERT_NUM as website_manager_cert_num from smms_web_case where RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID = #{ACCESS_ID} and WEBSITE_CASE_NAME=#{WEBSITE_CASE_NAME}
select count(*) from smms_web_case where ACCESS_ID = #{ACCESS_ID} and RECORDSTATE='0'
select DOMAIN_NAME from smms_web_case where RECORDSTATE='0'
select DOMAIN_NAME from smms_web_case where RECORDSTATE='0' and RID=#{RID}
select ACCESS_ID,DOMAIN_NAME,WEBSITE_URL,SPONSER_ADDRESS as SNAPSHOP from smms_web_case where RECORDSTATE='0' and RID=#{RID}

SELECT swc.access_id as ACCESS_ID,swc.domain_name as DOMAIN_NAME,swc.SPONSER_ADDRESS as SNAPSHOP,swc.rid as rid FROM smms_web_case swc where #{URL} like upper(CONCAT('%',swc.domain_name,'%')) and swc.RECORDSTATE='0'
SELECT * FROM smms_web_case WHERE WEBSITE_URL = #{WEBSITE_URL} and RECORDSTATE='0'
SELECT RID FROM smms_web_case WHERE ACCESS_ID = #{ACCESS_ID} and RECORDSTATE='0'

SELECT sii.rid as siiRid, sii.IDC_NAME as idc_name, swc.rid as swcRid, swc.WEBSITE_NAME as website_name, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as sponser_case_num, swc.WEBSITE_URL as website_url FROM smms_web_case as swc left join smms_idc_info as sii on swc.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where #{URL} like upper(CONCAT('%',swc.domain_name,'%')) and swc.RECORDSTATE='0'
select from SMMS_WEB_CASE a LEFT JOIN smms_idc_info b ON a.ACCESS_ID = b.IDC_ID where a.RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_WEB_CASE set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
